ProductInfo.Features:
2.5 inch TFT-LCD wireless monitor with rechargeable Li-battery. Effective Pixels: 480 x 240. Night Vision Range: 4.5 feet.
3 useful accessories includes: hook, mirror and magnet. Allows for easy visual inspections in hard to reach areas.
Lightweight, handhold design for easily find, diagnose and solve problems. Consumption Current (Max): 450mA.
Power Supply: 4 x AA. Waterproof Level: IP67 with Underwater.
Video Output Level: 0.9-1.3VP-P@75ohm. Video System: PAL/NTSC.
ProductInfo.Name: Wireless Waterproof Sewer Pipe Inspection Camera with 2.5 inch TFT-LCD Monitor
